elements.label: para
elements.text:
A&Q Hydro Power Project – Consultant Tender
Rev.no.: 00
Rev. date: 23.09.2025

elements.label: sec
elements.text:
Appendix 2 – Equipment, Facilities and Services of Others to be Provided
by the Client

elements.label: sub_sec
elements.text:
1
Site investigations

elements.label: para
elements.text:
The Client will make all relevant existing site investigations available to the Consultant. See folder: 05
Site Investigations.

elements.label: para
elements.text:
The client will provide updated hydrological data for use in the Production Potential. The data will be
released in October 2025.

elements.label: para
elements.text:
During 2025 additional site investigations have been conducted in the area. These investigations
include core drilling of seven (7) new boreholes and installation of thermistor strings, seismic surveys
in intake lake, as well as area of outfall of transfer tunnel. Mapping of depth of lakebed was also
performed in intake lake.

elements.label: para
elements.text:
The results of these investigations are expected to be ready for the works included in this contract.
However, the intermediate results have already resulted in relocation of the intake chamber from what
was planned in the outline proposal.

elements.label: para
elements.text:
The Consultant shall review the investigations and advise the Client on the extent to which they are
suŬcient for inclusion in the Employer’s Requirements for the EPC Contract, and whether further
investigations are required, see section 2.2 in appendix 1.

elements.label: sub_sec
elements.text: 2 On site oŬce facilities and logistics

elements.label: para
elements.text:
The Client will pay for and arrange for on-site logistics and local transport related to necessary site
inspections during the EPC tender process.

elements.label: para
elements.text:
Visits to the site of the proposed hydropower station will have to be conducted by helicopter, normally
from the town of Ilulissat. The helicopter is limited to four (4) PAX (besides the pilot) for each trip. The
client will oversee chartering the needed transport for the number of visits agreed to.

elements.label: para
elements.text:
The consultant should include travel expenses including tickets and hotel for three (3) people in
connection with one (1) site visit EPC tender preparation and one (1) site visit for EPC Contractor
Selection.

elements.label: para
elements.text:
The client allows for the following time schedule for a site visit: Two (2) travel days for a return trip to
Ilulissat and one (1) day for a site visit with helicopter.

elements.label: para
elements.text:
Under the option of construction supervision, the Client will make available basic oŬce and
accommodation on site for the persons preforming the services described.

elements.label: sub_sec
elements.text: 3 Information exchange and digital platforms

elements.label: para
elements.text:
NunaGreen will provide a Microsoft SharePoint platform for data storage and exchange during design
and tender preparation. The Consultant is expected to use this platform for the services included in
this contract.

elements.label: para
elements.text: NunaGreen will provide a Dalux Tender platform for the EPC Pre-Qualiﬁcation and Tender.
